programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to find her ex in a relationship, she enlists her best friend to act as her fake boyfriend.

programme.title: Royally Yours, This Christmas
programme.desc: A royal prince falls in love with a single mother and hotel housekeeper at Christmastime after he mistakes her for a wealthy hotel guest.

programme.title: A Christmas Wish in Hudson
programme.desc: A woman takes a shot at love after seeing a widowed firefighter and chef on a cooking show. With the help of his daughter, the two of them might find love this Christmas.

programme.title: The Heiress of Christmas
programme.desc: Heiress to the famed department store Hamptons, Loryn is put to the test by her grandmother. Things don't run smoothly as Loryn works at the store during its busiest time of the year and tries to impress the handsome but cynical manager Aiden.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Carol
programme.desc: When a fiercely independent pastry chef agrees to accompany her hunky dream man home for the holidays, things quickly devolve as he reverts into a momma's boy and she finds herself caught in a tug-of-war with his smothering mother.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Claire deals with her fragmented relationships; Peter arrives suddenly, forcing Claire to confront him.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Claire is emotionally distressed over the loss of Peter and Tess; Claire decides to sell Drover's Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Mark returns to Gungellan to drag Sean into the life of crime; Meg has competition for Terry's affection.

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: Two sisters enter a TV baking contest in a last-ditch effort to save the family bakery.

programme.title: A Christmas Wish in Hudson
programme.desc: A woman takes a shot at love after seeing a widowed firefighter and chef on a cooking show. With the help of his daughter, the two of them might find love this Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas at the Amish Bakery
programme.desc: After leaving her Amish community in her youth, book editor Sarah finds herself in desperate need of a new cookbook to save her job. She returns to the family farm to reconnect with her roots, and works with an outsider to save her family's bakery.

programme.title: A Sprinkle of Christmas
programme.desc: Libby, a baker, has opened up her business just in time for the Christmas season. She finds herself in a heated online feud with Peter after he gives the bakery a scathing review.

programme.title: Christmas With Felicity
programme.desc: A struggling baker returns to her hometown to try to get Christmas spirit back.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Carol
programme.desc: When a fiercely independent pastry chef agrees to accompany her hunky dream man home for the holidays, things quickly devolve as he reverts into a momma's boy and she finds herself caught in a tug-of-war with his smothering mother.
